case.state: (If Info-chan gave me the right address, she should be around here somewhere.)
(No, she's not at this table either...)
(Just like Osana, down to the twintails. This shouldn't be too bad.)
(Tsundere. Twintails. I've handled this before... but is ~player~ her Senpai...? She's no threat to me, if so.)
(Martial bent. Space-suit. Threat.)
(I can't take her in a fight. If she becomes a problem, ambush will be necessary.)
(Well-muscled. Fast. Evasive. There has to be a weakness.)
(Confident. Pretty. Athletic. Quick. What's her weakness?)
(Dead. Spectral. Conflicted. A vision of me, if I fail.)
(Cute. Undead. Violent. Avoid and treat as obstacle. Seek aid from occult club if needed)
(Schoolgirl. Sickly. Vulnerable. Dispatch only if necessary.)
(Persistent. Ill. Mentally durable. Befriend or avoid.)
(Grifter. Gambler. Cunning. Skilled enough to keep his head above water. Avoid.)
(Flexible. Evasive. Mystic. He's going to cheat. Two can play at this game.)
(Kith. Reflection. Manipulative. She'd stop at anything for her Senpai. So will I.)
(Focused. Talented. Ambitious. Willing to sacrifice everything for her Senpai. So would I.)
(Slovenly. Narcoleptic. Distractable. Easy prey.)
(Lazy. Passive. Slow. Senpai would never choose her.)
(Deceptive. Confident. Foolish. She'd be a problem if the police were involved...)
(Obfuscating. Illusory. Shallow. She's hiding something. Not a problem. I'm good at getting to the heart of a matter.)
(Hero. Klutz. Lovesick. Let's give her another form of heartache.)
(Strong. Determined. Compassionate. Befriend her. Don't let her become a nuisance.)
(Arrogant. Magical. Lusty. She'll sate her needs here, but don't draw her attention.)
(Desperate. Powerful. Arcane. Pity those who cross her, and stay out of her path.)
(Survivor. Adventurer. Lighthearted. She's better than she looks. Keep my distance.)
(Duelist. Aristocrat. Kind. I can see her reacting poorly if I go to far... best keep an eye on it. )
(Foolish. Drifting. Deja Vu. Perfect for a getaway.)
(Gas. Gas. Gas. Gasoline can be a weapon, so can carbon monoxide.)
(Curious. Unconventional. Formidable. If she knew how to use that strength, she could be a problem.)
(Confused. Indomitable. Adventurous. She's not useful to me.)
(Aroused. Popular. Durable. No need to clip those wings... but let's leverage him as a distraction.)
(Persistent. Dumb. Horny. Give the angel a taste of heaven, and he'd be eating out of the palm of your hand...)
(Kindred. Silent. Friendless. She'd be an easy asset, and simple to understand.)
(Regal. Serene. Conflicted. Help her learn about herself, and she'll aid you. I can work with this.)
(Explosive. Insecure. Megalomaniacal. She can be pointed in the right direction and incited to violence easily. A good ace in the hole.)
(Strange. Overconfident. Monomaniacal. Give her an opportunity to demonstrate herself, and she'd be an easy asset to disposing of a problem.)
(Greedy. Pirate. Shameless. She could be a problem... or a solution. What would she do for money? Find out.)
(Confident. Traveled. Experienced. I'm interested to see how she's watched people die. Or killed them herself.)
(Pitiful. Fragile. Volatile. Did she lose her Senpai?)
(Conflicted. Violent. Insecure. A vision of the future, if I'm not careful. Best to learn from her mistakes, and make use of her tendencies... valuable learnings.)
(Brash. Driven. Aggressive. Not worth the fight. Her knife is bigger, besides.)
(Strong. Angry. ...Exhibitionist? She's a woman with no shame. Unfortunate. She could be a useful tool...)
(Ruinous. Deadly. Dispassionate. Escape. Don't present yourself as a threat.)
(Dangerous. Determined. Collaborative. She's not here for the sex. Which means...)
(Mature. Survivor. Heroic. Can't blackmail him. Just disregard. Not a threat for me or Senpai.)
(Durable. Responsive. Patriotic. None of these traits are useful to me, or dangerous. Just pretend to be a normal schoolgirl.)
(Beautiful. Conceited. Clever. Flatter her and keep her away from Senpai...)
(Refined. Seductive. Overconfident. I could... if seduced, could she be useful? I wonder...)
(Smart. Pretty. Oblivious. A woman of her passions. No challenge here.)
(Intelligent. Exploring. Professional. She's not in opposition to me aside from the card game.)
(Offbeat. Unnerving. Disorganized. She'd be easy to dispatch, or perhaps... not.)
(Musical. Weird. Camouflaged. She's more than she appears... but I think she has a senpai of her own... ~player~?)
(Refined. Elegant. Morose. She and I could find common ground. Maybe, she'd even be a willing ally if she knew she was helping the cause of "love"...)
(Self-effacing. Quiet. Dark. I think this one could actually help. She seems to enjoy the tragic depths of passion...)
(<i>Idealistic. Bright. Foolish. This one could be useful./i>)
(Hopeful. Misguided. Hunted. She's used to looking over her shoulder. But she's open to trust. I can use her.)
(Mature. Professional. Mercenary. Interesting. There's some way to use her authority...)
(Career-oriented. Overworked. Ambitious. I can leverage our age difference, can't I?)
...You've changed your name, but not your face, ~marker.playername~.
~marker.playername~... Trying to hide your identity, then?
Oh, you're a father? Terribly lewd of you to play this with a normal high school girl... should we be worried for your kids?
You know, they say people who want to be called Daddy are compensating for something...
If you're willing to play a game with a highschooler... you're not much of a mother. Believe me, I'd know.
I don't think a mother would want to play a game like this with highschoolers... but maybe you're just terrible.
Let's make this quick.
The Doomslayer? I'm no demon. But I can give it a shot.
It's fine if you jerk-off to me, but work on the game, please.
I don't really care if you beat off to me, but don't procrasturbate.
S-Senpai? W-wait... you aren't...
S-Senpai!? What are you doing-- you are not Senpai....
Osana... it's been a long time. Are you... sure you ought to be doing this and not... something else?
Osana? You're playing strip poker? ...Are you... hm. Are you sure Senpai would approve?
...Huh? The game's starting? Right now? Yeah, yeah, I knew that. (Dammit, if I back out now...)
Wait, y-you're-- we're starting already? O-of course I can play... (If I leave now, I'd...)
I wish to take ~cards~.
I'd like to take ~cards~ please.
Sorry, I really need ~cards~.
I will definitely win with these cards!
You dealt me a good hand. Is there a reason why, though?
I wanted this hand!
Oh, how lovely.
Oh... these seem like good cards.
Hm... (Info-chan, thank you.)
These cards are good. You know what else is good? Being with someone you love.
I guess these can be of use to me.
These are so good!
Just what I was looking for.
Excellent.
And nothing's amiss.
Hm. These will serve me well.
I'm pretty creative, but I like it when my work is done for me.
Blood stains? What are you talking about?
No, I don't know anything about all those dead crabs down at the beach.
Is there a reason you're staring at me?
It's rude to stare. Oh, my cards? They're good.
I have a good hand. I hope this information suffices.
Ah... I'm still in.
You're not going to be upset with me if I win, are you? Even if you were...
I s-suppose you can look at me longer if you don't win more hands...
It's great to see how well you've recovered from your recent breakdown, Raven.
Speaking of sharp knives... any advice on other weapons?
Hm... I didn't think to carry my blade openly. I prefer a ceramic knife. It's easier to shatter, but it sets off no alarms, and is excellent at slashing.
It's okay, Raven. We know you're not the sharpest knife in the drawer. Hmmm... talking of sharp knives...
Chara, the fallen human? How far can a human fall?
Just how easy would it be to kill someone who's half-Azarathian, half-demon?
Oh! I just got a new kitchen knife with shark-skin handle wrapping. Guaranteed not to slip, even when soaked in... milk.
Why is everybody looking at me? Don't do it. You're making me feel edgy.

Thinking about all of you... reminds me of how much I love my knife collection.
...Because I Iike you all so much.
I don't suppose anyone intends to tell stories about how they saw me naked... that just wouldn't do...
Say... if you like my scars, I have some suggestions for how you could get some of your own! Er... just kidding.
If you're expecting some manner of reaction out of me, I'm afraid you'll be disappointed...
A shame my underwear didn't have space to store any spare cards, am I right? Ahaha... j-just kidding...
Nobody is going to get the better of me tonight.
I will make sure that I am the last one standing, by all and any means necessary.
(I will have to keep a close eye on these others. Nobody will best me.)
(To draw attention to myself or to blend in...)
If you don't hold your cards carefully, you can get a paper cut on your finger. I've seen it happen. All the time.
I heard that someone had a nervous seizure after playing this game recently.
I wasn't staring at any of you, I was... just thinking.
I don't know why any of you think I'm looking at you funny. I'm just standing here doing nothing.
I hate pointless card games. Oh wait... I don't mean this card game.
Have you heard any rumors about someone hating me? Or me hating them...?
Are you trying to start something with me?
H-haha... we're all so normal and boring. Wouldn't it be funny if we weren't?
I don't like the others very much. Err - just kidding.
Who has been spreading malicious rumors about me?
This card game is OK. It's just that some of the company is... well...
I think it's my destiny to win. I think it's my duty to win by any and all means necessary.
Just don't let me find out who's been writing that graffiti about me in the washrooms.
And to think, you could see some of us on adult websites before we even played this game...
(If I can win a game like this, I can win Senpai's affection. I'm sure of it.)
I know all of you are not the sharpest knives in the drawer. Hmmm... talking of sharp knives...
Oh!
Oh no...
Did... I do something wrong? Why are these cards so terrible?
I wonder if the others are cheating.
Are any of you cheating? Deceiving the rest of us...?
Maybe we could just stop playing cards and just hang out... Or just keep playing cards.
I'd rather get a bad hand now than later in the game, I guess.
I think maybe someone's trying to make me lose.
Did I do something bad?
Am I going to have to be thoroughly punished today?
It's even worse than I thought.
Why are you screwing with me like this?!
Somebody's counting the cards, I just know it.
If you admit you've been cheating, I won't hold it against you for the rest of the game. Promise.
...Not now.
(If I'm this bad at a simple card game, how could I ever hope to...)
I can't win with these.
I... I'm going to lose.
I won't ask for mercy. But... I'd rather put up a better fight...
The dealer must absolutely hate me.
Alright... I see how it is.
Eheh-- ahaha--- ahahahah! A pirate's booty! I get it. That's delightfully funny!
So... you're the type of girl that shows off her ass...ets. I guess with how big it is, someone's bound to get distracted...
...I'm curious myself. Until now I've just been tyring to remove any obstacles. By dissuading anyone who'd try to win his love, or at least to let me go first.
This could be useful to know. But for my own sake... I've just been taking pains to make sure he sees me as the only viable option.
(...There's no harm in practicing some social pressure, is there?)
(It's not like I stand out, and nobody would believe it if anyone did make it home.)
(I can be nice. Or... I can practice a few forms of manipulation. I don't think that'd be the worst use of time here, not that I'm getting anything else from it...)
I... I love a man. He's an upperclassman. And... that's all I know. He makes my world feel warm. He's kind but... there's a deeper, more... substantial experience than even that, Mulan...
(That won't work on me.) I don't suppose it makes you more durable, Perona?
(Good. Looks like her powers can't hurt me. Good to know.) Perona, does it make you more durable, at all? Or is it mostly for offense?
Is that so? Who's causing you problems, Cynthia? Or... perhaps it's true and you're just ashamed of it. Which is it? I'm sure I can help.
Stella is your real name, right? It sounds like you made someone... have an accident they didn't get better from.
I'm sure the blood on your hands was an accident, then. It happens. Don't let someone hold it over you.
A competition...? I'm... fairly creative, I suppose. Perhaps hide and go seek.
(What an interesting list... good to know.) I'm... not afraid of very much. Losing my Senpai to someone else... that would be the worst thing in the world.
I suppose it would depend on the type of monster... but that sort of thing seems more interesting to the Occult Club than me...
Well, if you killed them once, surely you can do it again. Though maybe the solution is to let two enemies take care of each other.

I don't really have friends. Not any deep friendships. I don't see much point in that. Nami... I'm old enough to know that... this person is the one place in my life I feel... whole. Fixed. Not empty. I think you'd know that.

I know enough to know that my Senpai... he makes me feel... complete. And after almost two decades of feeling anything but... I know that I'd do anything for him. Give anything for him. That's enough for me, Nami.
How prolific, and you've never been caught?
But... for what purpose? That's a great deal of murder...
If somebody answers that question easily, they're almost definitely hiding something worse.
If everyone was 100% honest every waking moment of their life, the world would be in shambles.
One of the girls in my class heads out back to smoke with her friends every day during lunch, and then carries the smell in with her when class starts. Needless to say, I'm not a fan.
I guess they're... decently important to me. I'm a little closer to my mom, though, since we've got more in common.
Save it. Maybe I'd take out a hundred or so dollars as spending money, but I need to be prepared for whatever the future has planned for me.
If somebody's shallow enough to base their opinion of me solely off of what I might have done in the past, I want nothing to do with them.
On... I want to see all of him. And for him to see all of me. I want to have all of him, all for me...
The person I love more than anything would never. I wouldn't let them. And they wouldn't want to.
...I could never share him. Nobody could ever love him like I love him.
I hope I'd never have to. I don't intend to waste a single drop of him...
...Something that's a picture on a screen could never compare to the real thing. I suppose if he wanted me to learn how to do something to show him my love...
I... I'm not sure. What's the right amount? When you're sore? I can't imagine ever wanting to let him go... but we have other needs like eating and sleeping, don't we?
Actually... is there one men like? What are my best assets? How can I show off my best side? Be useful.
Are... you talking about anal sex? ...Do men think less of you if you let them do that? I'm not very experienced... but I'd gladly give him all of me.
Do any of you think this game would be so much better if you played it with someone you loved? What are they like?
Has anyone ever been in love? Not the childish, posturing kind with flowers and cards. I mean the passionate kind of love that cuts to the bone. That gives you purpose. Love you'd do anything for.
I can't help but notice that you're ogling my scars... do you not have any of your own?
Scars tell a story... mine are... well, tell me about yours, first. Then we can talk.
~player~ is going to become a variable here
T-that's the worst thing you can say about me.
I don't like it when people call me that...
O-Oh... I'm so sorry. I'm sure you haven't... done anything to deserve that.
I-I'm just so shaken by having to undress... I sort of stumbled into this game. Not very like me...
...Are you so insecure that a girl in a school uniform is threatening? Perhaps you're less tough than you look.
...You're just like one of those hooligans that acts tough. Don't bully me. I won't stand for it.
S-sorry. I just didn't plan to be here. I'll be okay. I just need a moment to get my bearings.
I... what are you talking about? I'm doing everyone a courtesy by staying. I didn't plan on undressing for strangers tonight. But maybe you should take what you get.
That's an... odd icebreaker. (She's actually quite perceptive. She might be more of a threat than she makes herself out to be.)
Ah, I... didn't really have a plan to play this. But, yes. I'd hate to stand out. Besides, you'd rather be the center of attention, wouldn't you?
It was a bit of an accident. I came here looking for a friend... in a manner of speaking.
I actually was looking for a friend... but I'd rather not make a scene. This could be an interesting game, after alll...
As such, I don't suppose you're going to let me fade into the background? Speaking of, where did you decide on that name?
Well, I'm certainly no professional gambler, Fate. And when did you pick "Twisted Fate" as your moniker? It seems rather...
...I suppose one emptiness calls to another, then. And ~player~? ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ makes you feel... alive?
...I see. Not much sense in hiding it. And this ~player~ person? They're your special someone? I can't even tell what gender they present as. What does that say about you?
I don't have friends. Not any... ones of substance. Since your friendships sound so fulfilling, why aren't you having more fun with them than this?
Well, speak for yourself. Why is this somehow better for you than spending time with them. I was here for other reasons. I see no reason to draw attention to myself by making a fuss and leaving.

Oh, everybody is watching me!
(I hope!)
How lucky. I thought I'd go the whole game without being noticed...
I'd better start getting undressed. I don't want anyone forgetting that I'm here.
Well, I suppose I'm the center of attention. Should I be excited or scared?
It's me, again.
I hope this is fine.
Do you ever feel as though you've won something, and should feel something, but you don't?
Don't worry about me. I'm... happy because I was winning until now.
I-I-I-I-I didn't lose on purpose there because the others were getting all the attention.
W-why would anyone imply I'm trying to fit in by throwing the game? That's crazy.
Oh my.
I've never found much value in elaborate underwear. If it does its job, innocuous is better, don't you think?
Do people find poker aptitude attractive? I suppose it expresses a certain creativity.
Creativity is something I usually save for other pursuits. But I hope you find my cardplay... er... interesting?
Oh it's my turn to get naked. I need to feel wanted. Like anyone does, yes?
I worked so hard, and yet I still had to get naked.
Do I have to take all my clothes off now? Oh wait, that would be weird, right?
I suppose this is proving to be a worth test of wits.
Oh no, all the attention's on me! How great... ly embarrassing.
Aha-- I... I mean oh no. I'm a schoolgirl, so I shouldn't enjoy getting naked, should I?
It's my turn to take something off as a demonstration of my good will.
I've lost the hand, but... I suppose you're all more interested in what I'm hiding under my clothes.
I find it so insulting when someone calls me "Yandere-chan." Ayano Aishi is a perfectly normal name. For a perfectly normal girl.
Hm. A shame. I suppose I should be a lot more ashamed or aroused, but I suppose it's worth warning you...
Oh no. I am going to have to take something off, and people might start noticing me... Being noticed is so troubling.
I wouldn't want to be known as the type of girl who secretly enjoys illicit things. But I'll do whatever I have to in order to reach the end of this game.
All eyes are on me again.
Sorry if my underwear is disappointing. I prefer functional, normal apparel.
I can't stand for others getting all the attention. Why would someone play a game like this if they didn't, in some part, want to have people look at them?
Hm. My breasts, like the rest of me, are perfectly normal. Absolutely, completely normal.
Must I really get naked? I must? Oh well.
And to think, I've come such a long way from gym showers.
I'm a bit embarrassed, but the others had better be watching me when I strip.
It's... it's not as though I didn't know what I signed up for. What type of person would play a game with ulterior motives?
Oh no, I'm losing already. I'll be the center of attention if I'm not careful. I absolutely, certainly wouldn't want that.
To be noticed... clearly not what anyone wants in a game like this.
I'd rather die than be the boring one still fully dressed.
You won't think less of me if I play by the rules, will you? I wouldn't mind if I could feel flattery, or, really, anything.
Maybe losing this game will make me feel more complete. Er, just kidding!
I suppose there's worse outcomes. I could get caught doing something far more socially disabling than getting naked.
If I'm the first to forfeit... why, I don't know what I'd do.
There's something liberating about changing out of your clothes. It's like putting on a whole new facade...
I'm not sure what I've done to deserve this. I-I mean... i-it'd be wrong for a perfectly normal person, right?
A shame. And things were going so smoothly.
I'm such a bad poker player, and a bad girl. Right?
My heartbeat's so slow... perhaps this isn't so bad. Maybe I'm just afraid you'll think less of me if I say I like this.
(I'm so stupid! Why can't I do anything right!? I wish I were dead!)
(No... Senpai... I'm... this isn't... don't think of me like some dumb...)
It's an insult. Like calling someone a madwoman. Could you tell me who said that? I'd like to put those types of comments to rest.
It means someone is sick in the head. Who did you hear that from? I want to try and bury that type of talk as soon as I can.
Thanks for clarifying. I'm... somewhat used to having to deal with bullying.
I'm familiar with bullying, so I appreciate your apology. Thank you, Meia.
Tell me, Chara. Was it worth it? Whatever you had to do to win ~player~'s love?
Are you doing this to win their love? Or perhaps you think this is sporting?
You know, it's rude to take a picture up a girl's skirt.
I'm wearing grey panties. Nothing you can sell, if you're trying to take a photo. I'm not stupid.
The other girls here are all gossipy, deviant little tarts. Err - just kidding!
I hope you all know that you shouldn't gossip. You're all getting naked, too.
This won't become... scandalous, will it? You should know I don't take threats to my reputation lying down.
I wonder if anyone is trying to see up my skirt. It would be punishable though.
I hope nobody's trying to get ahead of themselves...
Do you prefer my hair up? Or should I tear it down? Or off? Er... just kidding.
You'd be surprised how small things can keep a person together.
I like to keep my hair up. It's... frustrating when you get hair in your eyes when you're doing something important.
I like to keep my hair up. It's... frustrating when you get hair in your eyes when you're doing something important. Or someone, am I right? H-hahah?
Thigh-highs are a good distraction, don't you think? While we're being honest?

I think stockings or thigh-highs are perfectly good at their function. I think they're also useful at distracting people. Amazing how tiny amounts of flesh can do so much. Like pump blood! Or... lewd things. H-hah?
It's like getting changed for gym. Except I'm not wearing a sports bra. Or something otherwise normal.
I don't know about the rest of you, but I like to my clothes right after I take them off. I hate to leave loose ends.
I don't really like a mess. I tend to throw my clothes directly into the wash.
They match, of course.
It all matches, if you're curious. And why wouldn't you be? Unless you found me boring...
...And no, my scars don't interfere with the aesthetics or the function. I'm perfectly capable of feeling touch. S-so...
No, my scars don't obscure anything important.
I'd hoped to reserve this view for as few people as necessary... but I suppose making it through this game makes it a necessity.
I understand that people are particular about being naked in front of others... if so, please keep this a secret between us.
Personally, I like my neckerchief. It's... er... the chief of my neck.
I know that some people find ribbons and scarves archaic... but sometimes tradition is a good thing, don't you think?
You would do that? Well... there's this one girl at school... it's... I don't want to talk about it in detail... (Now this is an acceptable twist.)
Oh? I suppose you are a pirate... I-I mean, it was so... I don't even know if I should really say, but this one girl at school... (This could prove... beneficial.)
It's not a swimsuit... and I don't think I'd play this type of game during... you know.
I... don't know what to say. It's a normal set of underwear. A-and it's not bloody.
Besides. I'm not like you. I have someone to protect. To cherish. I want to fill my emptiness, not spread it.
Spare me the sermon. I want to find a solution to this hollowness. Senpai is that solution. Everyone else can go on the way they are, as long as they stay out of my way.
We've established my mishaps with blades, yes? I wouldn't shave myself bare.
A woman with no pubic hair looks exceedingly vulnerable. You don't want someone to take advantage of that, would you? This presents me as a self-capable woman. Very self-capable.
I like to trim my hair up. You're less likely to leave any behind. S-such as in someone's mouth. Or...
I don't think I could ever have the confidence in my appearance to not trim it up a bit. I'd hate for anyone who sees me naked to think I'm slovenly, unkempt, or disinterested.
I-I wasn't going to say anything, but... ~marker.case_knife~... W-well, don't cross them...
Y-you really don't want to make ~marker.case_knife~ unhappy... l-look at what... I'm sorry, don't hurt me again, ~marker.case_knife~!
I'll try to look as pretty as possible, not that I'm desperate for attention or anything.
Oh, that wasn't so hard! It's like you're inviting me into your lives. Just for this one moment. Isn't that poetic and beautiful?
Be careful with that scrunchie. That could kill a pigeon if it got its head caught up inside.
Please be careful with that. It could really hurt you if it snapped into your eye.
Once, I heard a kitten choked on elastic like that. Please be careful. I'd hate to see anyone get hurt.
I wonder if anyone's used a necktie to choke someone, or if that's just a rumor or a joke?
I like the color of that. If you get a nosebleed, you can wipe it up. Just make sure you wash blood out with hydrogen peroxide.
It's a surprisingly versatile tool. You'd be amazed what you can do with common objects. S-sorry, I didn't mean to make a lewd joke-- you wouldn't expect that from me, would you?
Oh... these? I had a bad accident. Those delinquents really don't know when to let up.
My scars? I cut myself. While shaving. I'm very detail oriented, and I'd hate to think someone got the wrong idea...
Oh... I suppose you can see those scars. I wouldn't worry about them. I don't.
I must have done something really bad to be getting punished like this.
No, the scars don't continue under my underwear. I'd never let anyone put something that sharp down there.
Y-you're welcome. F-for the view. J-just don't think I'm doing it f-for you.
(Strangely bracing! A-and Senpai isn't even--)
(What's this? I feel a bit...) Hm... I don't mind if you look, you know. It wouldn't hurt my feelings.
A small amount of grooming means I don't... nevermind.
I'm... particular about my appearance. I want to look good for one person. Also in particular.
...You've caught me in a lie. I hope you won't think less of me. Or about me more than you have to. But I... can be kind of clumsy.
I know my scars are so ugly. Please... don't shame me for them.
If it helps, they don't hurt at all. Not even people's cruel comments or remarks...
Oh you lost ~name~! I'll come and give you a hug... or a handshake.
I could stand with you for moral support, ~name~. Don't let me invade your personal space though.
Don't worry ~name~. Do you want me to take some clothes off so that we can feel more together in this?
Hahaha! You're so gorgeous when you blush, ~name~.
Please don't be shy, ~name~. I will stick by you right until the very end.
I-I-I-I-I was just looking at you to see if you are OK, ~name~. I'll stop!
You're so gracious in defeat, ~name~. You're so nice!
I feel like I'm beginning to warm to you, ~name~!
I'd be willing to give you something nice in return, ~name~.
If there's anything I can do to help, ~name~... ANYTHING... just name it!
You're so gallant, ~name~. Losing that round just to make the others happy.
Oh ~name~, you lost! Poor you.
I'm naked. Maybe if you're naked too, we may feel more connected to each other. Err - from a poker point of view... perhaps.
